member.name: M:FlickrNet.Utils.UrlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes url items according to some specific rules, i.e. '&', '=' and ' ' are also encoded to their respective codes.

member.returns: The encoded url paramter value.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Category
member.summary: Contains details of a category, including groups belonging to the category and sub categories.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Category.CategoryName
member.summary: The name for the category.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Category.Path
member.summary: A forward slash delimited list of the parents of the current group.
member.remarks: Can be matched against the list of PathIds to jump directly to a parent group.
member.example: Group Id 91, Romance will return "/Life/Romance" as the Path and "/90/91" as its PathIds

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Category.PathIds
member.summary: A forward slash delimited list of the ids of the parents of the current group.
member.remarks: Can be matched against the Path to jump directly to a parent group.
member.example: Group Id 91, Romance will return "/Life/Romance" as the Path and "/90/91" as its PathIds

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Category.SubCategories
member.summary: An array of items.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Category.Groups
member.summary: An array of items, listing the groups within this category.

member.summary: Holds details of a sub category, including its id, name and the number of groups in it.

member.summary: The id of the category.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.SubCategory.SubCategoryName
member.summary: The name of the category.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.SubCategory.GroupCount
member.summary: The number of groups found within the category.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Flickr
member.summary: The main Flickr class.
member.remarks: Create an instance of this class and then call its methods to perform methods on Flickr.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.SetPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Set the password used for authentication. Only needed for certain methods.
member.param: The password to be used.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the class with no email or password.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the class with the email address and password given
member.param: The API Key for to use.
The email address used for authentication.
The password used for authentication.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.DownloadPicture(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the picture from a internet and transfers it to a stream object.
member.param: The url of the image to download.
member.returns: A object containing the downloaded picture.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.UploadPicture(System.String)
member.summary: Uploads a file to Flickr.
member.param: The filename of the file to open.
member.returns: The id of the photo on a successful upload.
member.exception: Thrown when Flickr returns an error. see http://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html for more details.
member.remarks: Other exceptions may be thrown, see constructors for more details.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.UploadPicture(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uploads a file to Flickr.
member.param: The filename of the file to open.
The title of the photograph.
member.returns: The id of the photo on a successful upload.
member.exception: Thrown when Flickr returns an error. see http://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html for more details.
member.remarks: Other exceptions may be thrown, see constructors for more details.

member.summary: Uploads a file to Flickr.

The title of the photograph.

member.returns: The id of the photo on a successful upload.
member.exception: Thrown when Flickr returns an error. see http://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html for more details.
member.remarks: Other exceptions may be thrown, see constructors for more details.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.UploadPicture(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uploads a file to Flickr.
member.param: The filename of the file to open.
The title of the photograph.
The description of the photograph.
A comma seperated list of the tags to assign to the photograph.
member.returns: The id of the photo on a successful upload.
member.exception: Thrown when Flickr returns an error. see http://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html for more details.
member.remarks: Other exceptions may be thrown, see constructors for more details.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.UploadPicture(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uploads a file to Flickr.
member.param: The filename of the file to open.
The title of the photograph.
The description of the photograph.
A comma seperated list of the tags to assign to the photograph.
True if the photograph should be public and false if it should be private.
True if the photograph should be marked as viewable by friends contacts.
True if the photograph should be marked as viewable by family contacts.
member.returns: The id of the photo on a successful upload.
member.exception: Thrown when Flickr returns an error. see http://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html for more details.
member.remarks: Other exceptions may be thrown, see constructors for more details.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.UploadPicture(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Private method that does all the uploading work.
member.param: The filename of the file to be uploaded.
The object containing the pphoto to be uploaded.
The title of the photo (optional).
The description of the photograph (optional).
The tags for the photograph (optional).
0 for private, 1 for public.
1 if family, 0 is not.
1 if friend, 0 if not.
member.returns: The id of the photograph after successful uploading.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.PhotosGetCounts(System.DateTime[])
member.summary: Returns count of photos between each pair of dates in the list.
member.remarks: If you pass in DateA, DateB and DateC it returns a list of the number of photos between DateA and DateB, followed by the number between DateB and DateC. More parameters means more sets.
member.param: Array of objects.
member.returns: class instance.

member.summary: Does the user posses a pro account. 0 = free acouunt, 1 = pro account holder.

member.remarks: The unix timestamp of the date the first photo was uploaded.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Response
member.summary: The root object returned by Flickr. Used with Xml Serialization to get the relevant object.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Response.Error
member.summary: If an error occurs the Error property is populated with a instance.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.Response.AllElements
member.summary: If using flickr.test.echo this contains all the other elements not covered above.
member.remarks: t is an array of objects. Use the XmlElement Name and InnerXml properties to get the name and value of the returned property.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.ResponseError
member.summary: If an error occurs then Flickr returns this object.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.ResponseError.Code
member.summary: The code or number of the error.
member.remarks: 100 - Invalid Api Key. 99 - User not logged in. Other codes are specific to a method.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.ResponseError.Message
member.summary: The verbose message matching the error code.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.ResponseStatus
member.summary: The status of the response, either ok or fail.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.ResponseStatus.OK
member.summary: The response returns "ok" on a successful execution of the method.

member.name: F:FlickrNet.ResponseStatus.Failed
member.summary: The response returns "fail" if there is an error, such as invalid API key or login failure.

member.summary: Summary description for Cache.

member.summary: Creates a new exception with the given the code and verbose message string

member.summary: Creates a new exception from the class.
